vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for an alcoholic beverage establishment limited to a microbrewery, distillery, or winery use on property zoned Subdistrict A within Planned Development District No. 619, with Historic Overlay No. 121, the Dallas Power and Light Building, on the southeast corner of Commerce Street and Browder Street
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval for a two-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z189-351(JM)
